segments.text: My friend finally dumped her boyfriend , and she's sworn she's going to abstain until she finds the right man to marry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After going through an episode like that I'm not surprised . How's her headspace ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's doing great , she's getting her confidence back , and her self-esteem , has improved drastically.She ' s very happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm proud of you for standing by her . I think you've helped make a big difference in her life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any plans for next Sunday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My friend , who had the mishap , wants to take us to dinner to show her gratitude for helping her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She doesn't need to do that , I didn't do anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She feels you gave me the freedom to be able to assist her and she appreciates that . Come on , Let's indulge her .
segments.speaker: S1
